post_content:
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/51524/guiheen-sl[/IMG]

Nice copy of Portsmouth Southern Leaguer, Tom Guiheen in an SGC tomb.

Asking $30000.00 or best offer to me without fees which includes shipping and a word of thanks.

Please note that the back of the card is the same size as the front.  The same goes for the slab.:D

Frank --

I can't tell you how many times I get a card, and the front is a smidge bigger than the back.  I just tack it up to another lesson learned.  Ha...you're the best!

Cheers,
Geno

[quote name="HercDriver" post=2464914]Frank --

I can't tell you how many times I get a card, and the front is a smidge bigger than the back.  I just tack it up to another lesson learned.  Ha...you're the best!

Cheers,
Geno[/QUOTE]

This forum has never explored the incidence of one sided trimming Geno.  If the front is trimmed on the bottom, can the reverse be trimmed on the right side?  A lot of unanswered questions.  Guiheen is still available.
Feel free to offer  $363.27 and see what happens.
